definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: I can doubt our previous lives is a man.
sentences.chinese: 我简直怀疑我俩前生是一个人。

sentences.english: A glance five hundred years ago gain a shoulder this life .
sentences.chinese: 前生五百次的凝眸，换今生一次的擦肩。

sentences.english: The bank of the Ganges welcomed me into its lap like a friend of a former birth.
sentences.chinese: 恒河河岸就像我前生前世的老友一样拥我入怀。

sentences.english: The former five hundred Ningmou, change life brush a shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 前生五百次的凝眸，换今生一次的擦肩。

sentences.english: Those who ill-treat animals in the past or in this present life will meet with many sicknesses in life.
sentences.chinese: 过去或前生爱虐待动物的人，今世就得多病的报应。

sentences.english: Perhaps, in another lifetime, she was the center of his universe.
sentences.chinese: 也许，在前生，她是他宇宙的中心。

sentences.english: She did not remember her previous existence in Niigata .
sentences.chinese: 她已不记得她前生在新滹的一切。

sentences.english: He sounds even more bombastic in this life than the previous existence.
sentences.chinese: 相比前生，他听起来在此生更为夸夸其谈。

sentences.english: I met the former you, this is the only I know.
sentences.chinese: 我遇见了前生的你，这是只有我才知道的秘密。

sentences.english: P.S. They’ve decided not to wait until 2011 for a baby.
sentences.chinese: 另外，他们决定在2011年前生个宝宝。

sentences.english: Maybe it was from giving birth (to daughter Sunday Rose) 11 months prior.
sentences.chinese: 可能是因为我11个月前生下了女儿吧。

sentences.english: In the pre-earth life, I was already foreordained to be a missionary.
sentences.chinese: 我在前生已经被预派做一个传教士。

sentences.english: Fuck, This bitch, is the previous existence owes me .
sentences.chinese: 我操，这个骚货，是前生欠我的搞。

sentences.english: Yoga originated from the Vedic culture, which is pre-Hindu.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽源于吠陀文化，是印度教的前生。

sentences.english: The mother is doing well after she gave birth to conjoined babies 2 days ago.
sentences.chinese: 这位妈妈两天前生了一对连体婴儿后，状态良好。

definition: chance/opportunity/predestined relationship/(Buddhist) principal and secondary causes/chain of cause and effect
the past/impurity contracted previously (in the sentient world) (Buddhism)
reborn (of departed spirit)/to be reincarnated/to leave home for a new life
to die/future incarnation/next life/to be born/to come into the world/future generation
